response.original_title: Tears for Fears: Songs from the Big Chair
response.overview: Tears for Fears' biggest-selling album, Songs from the Big Chair is now available remastered in 5.1 for 2014. Including the hits 'Everybody Wants To Rule the World,' 'Mother's Talk,' 'Shout' and 'Head over Heels', Songs From The Big Chair is the phenomenal 10-million-selling second album that marked a transition in the band's sound and catapulted them into international prominence.
response.title: Tears for Fears: Songs from the Big Chair
